show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Economic Recovery? How They Trick You Into Believing It

title: Economic Recovery? How They Trick You Into Believing It
content:
Origins of the crisis. Household income is lower than in the mid-1960s. Since then the bottom 80% have seen their standard of living fall.
Healthcare costs have increased 3,300% since 1970, creating tens of millions of sickly, functional illiterates.
How debt has just been added systematically to paper over the cracks that are now deep crevices.
And now Americans are being asked to give up their freedom as well!
The economy will not accelerate in the “second half” as predicted.
Consumers do not have the wherewithal to spend.
Larry Summers, top contender for Fed Chairman when Bernanke leaves.
The list of outrages concerning him will not disappoint.
The state of marriage in our society.
